column2: CORRECTED-Amgen's cancer drug meets main goal in a late-stage studyUPDATE 1-Amgen's cancer drug meets main goal in late-stage study June 18 Amgen Inc said its drug met the main goal of improving overall survival in metastatic colorectal cancer patients who have not responded to chemotherapy.  UPDATE 1-Amgen's cancer drug meets main goal in late-stage study June 18 Amgen Inc said its drug met the main goal of improving overall survival in metastatic colorectal cancer patients who have not responded to chemotherapy. June 18 Amgen Inc said its cancer drug met its main goal of improving overall survival in patients with the third most common form of the disease.UPDATE 1-Amgen's cancer drug meets main goal in late-stage study June 18 Amgen Inc said its drug met the main goal of improving overall survival in metastatic colorectal cancer patients who have not responded to chemotherapy.

column2: U.S. current account widens on weak exports
column3: overseas profits WASHINGTON The U.S. current account deficit widened in the first quarter to its highest level since 2012 likely due to the strong dollar's drag on overseas profits and exports.

column2: Health Care REIT
column3: Revera to buy Regal Lifestyle Communities for C$374.4 mln June 18 Health Care REIT Inc and Revera Inc agreed to buy assisted living services provider Regal Lifestyle Communities Inc for about C$374.4 million ($308.5 million) in cash to expand in Canada.
